Text: More than $190 million of the additional money requested would add nearly 1,900 teachers and give them $1,000 each---up from this year's $600---to support classroom and students needs.
Effect: More than $190 million of the additional money requested would add nearly 1,900 teachers and give them $1,000 each---up from this year's $600
Sentence: <e2>More than $190 million of the additional money requested would add nearly 1,900 teachers and give them $1,000 each---up from this year's $600</e2>---to <e1>support classroom and students needs.</e1>
